1.name: Operating Systems and Terminal Knowledge
1.desc: Master the command line interface to control computers directly, enabling powerful system management and automation.

2.name: Learn Programming and Scripting
2.desc: Learn to write code that automates repetitive tasks and solves complex problems efficiently.

3.name: Version Control Systems (Git)
3.desc: Track and manage code changes over time, enabling seamless collaboration and maintaining project history.

4.name: CI/CD Tools
4.desc: Automate the process of testing and deploying code, ensuring consistent and reliable software delivery.

5.name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
5.desc: Define and manage infrastructure using code, making system setup repeatable and scalable.

6.name: Cloud Providers
6.desc: Learn to use cloud platforms to deploy and scale applications without managing physical servers.

7.name: Containerization
7.desc: Package applications with all their dependencies to ensure they run consistently across different systems.

8.name: Monitoring and Logging
8.desc: Track system performance and collect data to identify and fix issues before they become problems.
